lines.text: What kind of movie is it?
It's a film about brutality. What else would one make a movie about?
Everyone thinks he can push me around.
Are you all crazy? I want a palace, and you get me this lousy little hole! I just don't believe it! What is this? A kindergarten? Learn how to make movies first, you bastards!
For once in my life I wanted to make a movie without having all the responsibilities. You're producing it with my money anyway and making a balls-up of it, too. I must be nuts!
I want to get out of here. I don't want to make this damn movie.
The whole thing here makes me sick.
I think it's going to be tremendous.
Sascha, I can't take any more of this. You'll have to get someone from Germany or finish the movie yourselves! I can't go on!
You know very well no one but you can finish this movie.
You know what the worst thing is? When one realizes how damn bourgeois one is oneself.
